wikipedia_page.main: James Gibson (born 23 April 1989 in Irvine, Scotland) is a Scottish footballer who plays as a left back for Maybole in the Ayrshire District League. Originally signed with Hamilton Academical, his playing career in the Scottish Football League and Scottish Premier League with was plagued by persistent knee injuries. Gibson's contract with Accies was not renewed in 2011 and he signed for Junior side Maybole in January 2012.
